definition: A state or quality characterized by a lack of warmth or heat, often used to describe a specific atmosphere or environment. It is commonly associated with a refreshing or cool sensation, and is frequently used to describe the temperature or ambiance of a place or object.

examples.german: Die Kühle des Wassers war erfrischend.
examples.english: The coolness of the water was refreshing.

examples.german: Im Schatten des Baumes genossen sie die angenehme Kühle.
examples.english: In the shade of the tree, they enjoyed the pleasant coolness.

examples.german: Die Kühle des Abends ließ die Hitze des Tages vergessen.
examples.english: The coolness of the evening made them forget the heat of the day.

examples.german: Die Kühle des Metalls fühlte sich unangenehm auf der Haut an.
examples.english: The coolness of the metal felt unpleasant on the skin.

examples.german: Die Kühle des Windes brachte Linderung in der heißen Sommernacht.
examples.english: The coolness of the wind brought relief in the hot summer night.
